responsibilities: Design and build advanced data science and algorithm solutions to solve business problems such as fraud prevention, AML, user experience customization, and optimization.
Understand the payment business and translate business problems into data science and algorithm solutions.
Apply cutting-edge machine learning technologies in various payment business use cases.
Own end-to-end model solution lifecycle and work with stakeholders to deliver business impact.
Improve modeling infrastructures, labels, features, and algorithms for robustness, automation, and generalization.
Enhance risk machine learning excellence in privacy/compliance, interoperability, risk perception, and analysis.
qualifications: Proficiency in data science and machine learning.
Ability to design and implement algorithm solutions.
Strong understanding of payment business processes.
Experience with end-to-end model solution lifecycle management.
Expertise in improving modeling infrastructures and algorithms.
Knowledge of privacy, compliance, and risk analysis in machine learning.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills focus on designing and building data science and algorithm solutions for business problems, particularly in the payment industry. The responsibilities include applying machine learning technologies, managing end-to-end model solutions, and improving modeling infrastructures. The skills required include proficiency in data science and machine learning, algorithm design, and understanding of payment business processes.

There is no explicit mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is more on general machine learning applications, fraud prevention, and risk analysis in the payment sector. While machine learning is a broad field that can include GenAI and LLMs, the job description does not specifically indicate that these technologies are involved.

Therefore, based on the provided information, it does not appear that the job specifically involves working with Generative AI or language models.
